CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 26, 1944, pg. 13, reads: "Fans Mob Hamp's Thrush - Here is a typical scene of the reception accorded Alice Lindsay, Lionel Hampton's new vocalist, in Columbus, Ohio, during the band's engagement at the Palace Theatre... Right: The exotic Alice looks at her new world through a mirror, but this time it's real. Alice received rave notices from newspaper, reviewers, and she is already being hailed as star material. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Alice or Alyce Lindsay wearing suit and hat, leaning on mantel and looking into mirror, possibly in Columbus, Ohio
